original_title: Europe's Roswell: UFO Crash in Abersytwyth
overview: On a dark winter's night in January 1983, the sleepy Welsh village of Llanilar near Aberystwyth was buzzed by a strange flying craft, which hit trees, scattered shiny metal debris over four fields and flew off apparently unaffected. Witness for the first time ever in graphic detail genuine pieces of a crashed UFO.
title: Europe's Roswell: UFO Crash in Abersytwyth
